talk.abstract: Most pieces of modern software (web, desktop or otherwise) include that innocuous little text box with inviting word "Search" nearby. But behind it lies a torrid world of bad ideas, worse ideas & ideas no computer should be made to suffer. If you want to keep your good name & stay out of the hall of shame, this talk will give you a grounding on how to make the search in your software better.
talk.bio: Pythonista since 2003, Djangonaut since 2006. Wrote and maintains several OSS projects like Haystack, Tastypie, pysolr, itty, littleworkers. Loves search, APIs, and hard problems. Curator of fine animated gifs.

talk.name: Avoiding The Search Hall Of Shame
talk.title: Avoiding The Search Hall Of Shame
